name: Spandex
body:
# Spandex The ultimate background image stretcher. Simply: Or fade between images: ```javascript $('body').spandex({ speed: 1000 }, "images/studio54.jpg"); ``` Even give a single element a stretchy background: ```javascript $('#travolta').spandex("images/studio54.jpg"); ``` ### Options
Option Default Description
tagline: jQuery and Zepto background image stretcher
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
